short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove all visible content from the web with a single click. Click again and everything is restored, just as it was.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "This extension helps users eliminate distractions by hiding all visible content on web pages. With a single click, users can enjoy a minimalistic browsing experience, free from clutter. Ideal for users seeking focus and serenity while browsing. Activate the extension to instantly remove all elements from the current page, allowing for a clean and peaceful online environment
